title: Add admin dashboard to view demo class bookings

requirements.text: Create a new admin dashboard page accessible via a route (e.g., /admin) that displays all submitted demo class booking requests in a table format showing name, class, course, and submission timestamp

quotes: Ok but make me see it when I view it

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard displays all demo class bookings in a readable table
Each booking shows name, class, course, and timestamp
Dashboard is accessible via navigation or direct URL

requirements.text: Add a backend query method to retrieve all stored demo class booking submissions

quotes: Ok but make me see it when I view it

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides a query method that returns all demo bookings
Query returns name, class, course, and timestamp for each booking

requirements.text: Connect the admin dashboard to the backend using React Query to fetch and display real-time booking data

quotes: Ok but make me see it when I view it

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard fetches bookings from backend on load
Data updates automatically when new bookings are submitted
Loading and error states are handled gracefully

requirements.text: Add a navigation link or button in the Header component to access the admin dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard is accessible from the main navigation
Link is clearly labeled and visible to administrators

constraints: Use existing Tailwind CSS theme and styling patterns from the Takshashila Academia website
Use React Query for data fetching as per project conventions
nonGoals: Email sending functionality (not available on current plan)
User authentication or access control for the admin dashboard
Exporting booking data to external formats
